ygData.subject: Re: Hey all
ygData.msgSnippet: Its very boring, but you should be living in oasis till you are about level 20.
ygData.messageBody:
Its very boring, but you should be living in oasis till you are about
level 20.


> A very frustrated Cleric of Tunare
> Yilari
>
>
>
> > From: "Chrisstauf k" <chrisstauf@...>
> >
> > You know..I see these messages every no and then about cant find a group
> and
> > just cannot understand it. No matter where I have been I have always been
> > welcomed into a group within a matter of minutes. Sometimes It would take
> a
> > little work on my part. Such as casting buffs and heals on passer bys or
> > what not. Here is the line that I use. "Cleric of the X circle seeks group
> > to heal in battle". seems to work great for me. Who would'nt want a
> cleric?
> >
> > Chrisstauf Healingsoul of the Lightbringer Guild
> > 20th Cleric
> > Karana Server
> >
> >
> > >From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
> > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > >To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Hey all
> > >Date: Thu, 11 Nov 1999 16:02:33 -0500
> > >
> > >Well I am back :P Took a nice 3 month break from my cleric and EQ. WOW
> > >have things changed. I was in High Hold going to East Co and had to go
> > >through Kichlor Forest. I almost died trying to get through. I didnt
> know
> > >they changed that area. DAMN!!!!!! Anyway.... The reason I decided to
> > >leave because I couldnt find a group in any of the places. I still
> couldnt
> > >believe noone wanted a cleric in their group. Well I am level 25 and
> just
> > >wondering where can I hunt? The best places that a cleric will feel
> > >welcomed, and if you say unrest no way!!!! Thanks guys :)
> > >
> > >Qanin Skywanderer
> > >The Rathe 25th Circle
> > ><< text3.html >>
> >
> > >
>
> >
